feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 01:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
